root.key_with_description: Check it out! This key has a description! (At least in some formats)

deeply.key: Wow, this key is nested even deeper.

nested.key: This key is nested inside a namespace.

root.simple_key: Just a simple key with a simple message.
root.unverified_key: This translation is not yet verified and waits for it. (In some formats we also export this status)
